alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Central Marion; Eastern Clay; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 12:12PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Bradford, northeastern Marion, western Putnam and Clay Counties through 1245 PM EDT... At 1212 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles north of Camp Blanding to near Fort McCoy. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Interlachen, Keystone Heights, Fort McCoy, Salt Springs, Middleburg, Lake Delancy, George`s Lake, Lake Geneva, Florahome and Camp Blanding. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Central Marion; Eastern Clay; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Western Clay; Western Putnam
